name: Default Commented
name___comment: The theme's display name in the Themes menu.
library_background___comment: The background color of the Script Library.
thumbnail_border___comment: The color of the borders between files in the Script Library.
default_text___comment: The default color of interface text.
tint___comment: The tint color of interface buttons.
text_selection_tint___comment: The tint color of the text selection and cursor.
bar_background___comment: The background color of the toolbar and the active tab.
tab_background___comment: The background color of inactive tabs.
tab_title___comment: The color of the tab title text.
separator_line___comment: The color of the separator line between toolbar/tabs and editor.
background___comment: The default background color of the editor.
gutter_background___comment: The background color of the line number column on the left side of the editor.
gutter_border___comment: The color of the border that separates the gutter from the editor.
line_number___comment: The color of the line numbers in the gutter.
dark_keyboard___comment: Whether to use a dark onscreen keyboard.
font-size___comment: The default editor and console font size.
font-family___comment: The default editor and console font family.
scopes___comment: Formatting for various kinds of text in the editor. Formatting options are similar to CSS styles.

scopes.default___comment: Default text, for plain text files or text with no special meaning.
scopes.module___comment: Python module names as part of import statements.
scopes.function___comment: Function names as part of a function call.
scopes.builtinfunction___comment: Built-in function names as part of a function call.
scopes.functiondef___comment: Function names as part of a function definition.
scopes.classdef___comment: Class names as part of a class definition.
scopes.class___comment: Class names as part of a class instantiation.
scopes.escape___comment: Should probably be for escaped characters in string literals, but doesn't seem to do anything.
scopes.codeblock-start___comment: GitHub-style syntax highlighting instructions after code block start.
scopes.tag___comment: Is this Taskpaper or HTML or what now?
